Ok finished downloading:
Time for download 18 hrs 25 mins
Average speed 110kb/s (horrible considering I can get 800kb/s on private trackers)
Video 10/10
Audio 10/10
It is crystal clear and amazing! Thnks Ltt_01!

Excellent 1080p quality for 7GB, though it was Dark.  You'll likely need to up some Brightness options on your hdtv.
